body:
* add version 1.0 and 1.1
     *  startup file and codes is changed. (#9278)
* change to work on arm
     *  remove fp16 code when gcc is old. (https://www.gnu.org/software/gcc/gcc-6/changes.html#aarch64)
     * to assemble crc32, add -marc=armv8-a+crc
title: julia: new version and work on arm
